translations: n.大裁；大页纸；圆锥形的纸帽；滑稽帽（等于 fool's cap）

phrs.translation: 英国纸张标准规格, 滑稽帽, 大号书写纸, 大页纸

sentences.sentence: He was still rumbling discontentedly when Pike returned bearing a folder of foolscap sheets.
sentences.translation: 他正在不满地小声嘟囔时，派克抱着一叠印刷纸回来了。

sentences.sentence: The notes, written on yellow foolscap, contain an assortment of limericks and anecdotes, drifting into seeming nonsense.
sentences.translation: 这些写在黄色大页纸上的笔记，有打油诗也有趣闻轶事，表面上看来很荒谬。

sentences.sentence: I remember when I was a high school student, I would decorate the cover of my foolscap pads with quotes because they were so meaningful.
sentences.translation: 我至今记得，我还是个高中生时，最喜欢在大大的笔记本封面上写上各种箴言，因为它们饱含着丰富的人生哲理。
